title: SKColorFilter.CreateColorCube disappeared?
body:
### Description

Am I seeing things? A dozen or so versions ago there was support for LUT 3D cubes. The docs still list it: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/skiasharp.skcolorfilter.createcolorcube?view=skiasharp-1.57.1. Probably might have been removed from Skia itself but how come? Are we supposed to go backwards? :-(
